name: System Goose Overload
description: The great war between Geese and Humans has come to an end. All that remains of the Goose Empire, is you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128MB Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 2GHz+ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 200 MB available space
